verbose_text: Enriched cells (~ 85%-95% CD14+ by flow cytometry) were cultured for 7 days in RPMI containing 1 mM sodium pyruvate, 10% heat inactivated fetal bovine serum (FBS), 100 mug/ml penicillin and 100 mug/ml streptomycin, 10 mM HEPES (pH 7.5) (complete RPMI) plus 20 ng/ml human M-CSF to allow differentiation into macrophages.
evidence: heat inactivated fetal bovine serum (FBS), 100 mug/ml penicillin and 100 mug/ml streptomycin
